name: Surviving the Heat
description:
A fun endless shooter game on a desert

This small game was an experiment and also a Uni assignment in which I had to make a game from scratch using C++ and SFML (multimedia library) which meant no handy asset management, no handy editor and so on. 
Therefore the game might be less polished and less... stable, than it probably should be.
All the code is available on GitHub, here
